Listing.Property_Title: Fully Furnished | Luxurious Penthouse | Call Now

Web_Remarks.__cdata:
Le Reve is a residential tower that has a total of 50 floors, which is considered as one of the most attractive development projects in Dubai Marina. The property was designed to target the rich and famous who wish to have a very luxurious residence in Dubai.

Le Reves VIP residence are treated to private valet parking, a rooftop temperature-controlled pool and landscaped gardens, inhouse spa and gym, concierge service and 24hr security.

Property details:
* 4 Bedrooms + Maid's room
* 5 Bathrooms
* Full Palm Jumeirah & Sea View
* Huge Balcony
* Built-in Wardrobes
* Fully Fitted Kitchen
* Fully Furnished

Amenities and Facilities:

  • 24 Hour Concierge and Security
  • Fitness Gym
  • 2 Squash Courts
  • Swimming Pool
  • Pool for Children

Situated in the heart of Dubai Marina, Le Reve is renowned for offering its residents the utmost levels of security, privacy and discretion as well as giving complete peace of mind that the building is being maintained to the highest standards by the exemplary facilities management company.
